item.title: The public clock in Blue Market Square has stopped and is no longer showing the correct time. It likely just needs a battery replacement. Please could the council arrange maintenance?, 19th February
item.description:
The public clock in Blue Market Square has stopped and is no longer showing the correct time. It likely just needs a battery replacement. Please could the council arrange maintenance?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Market Place, Bermondsey, Greater London

item.title: 2nd street lamp from top of St. Mary’s Avenue, same side as Church Hall, outside number 1 St. Mary’s Avenue, 19th February
item.description:
I reported the fact that this street light isn’t working some time ago, and eventually received a report that no actionnwas being taken. The pavement is very dark and I have nearly fallen more than once. I don’t actually believe that this light has been inspected. It is not marked on your map. I am nearly 90 years of age, and several residents in St. Mary’s Avenue are also elderly, and we feel the lack of lighting is dangerous.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Hill Road, Shortlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
